ebi_api package¶

Submodules¶

ebi_api.pdb module¶

class ebi_api.pdb.EbiPdb(pdb_code, output_pdb_path)[source]¶

Bases: object

EBI PDBe entry downloader.

This class is used to download PDB files from the european PDB repository (http://www.ebi.ac.uk/pdbe)

Parameters:
  • pdb_code (str) – Protein Data Bank (PDB) four letter code. ie: ‘2ki5’
  • output_pdb_path (str) – File path where the PDB file will be stored. ie: ‘/home/user1/2ki5.pdb’
get_pdb()[source]¶

Writes the PDB file content of self._pdb_code to self._output_pdb_path
